entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
